programs.title: Parapsychology course
programs.description:
- 2-Month Course
- Introduction to Parapsychology
- Subtypes:
- Telepathy: Mind-to-Mind Communication
- Clairvoyance: Perceiving Information about Objects or Events
- Precognition: Predicting Future Events
- Psychokinesis (PK): Mind Over Matter
- Out-of-Body Experiences (OBEs): Experiencing Reality Beyond the Physical Body

- Channeling: Receiving Information from Higher Sources
- Reincarnation: Exploring Past-Life Experiences
- Paranormal Investigation: Researching Unusual Phenomena

programs.title: Trading Psychology Course
programs.description:
Course Highlights:
    - Understanding Trading Psychology
    - Managing Emotions in Trading
    - Developing a Trading Mindset
    - Risk Management Strategies
    - Building Confidence and Discipline
    - Overcoming Trading Fears and Biases
    - Practical Exercises and Case Studies

includes: Certification: Opportunity to earn a certification upon completing the course.
Personalised Support: Guidance and mentorship throughout the course to ensure success.
Online Practical Workshops: Hands-on training and immersive experiences to master hypnotherapy skills.

programs.title: NLP Course: How to become a NLP Practitioner

includes: Managing Stress and Anxiety: Learn NLP techniques to calm your mind and body
Overcoming Fear and Phobias: Use NLP to break free from limiting fears
Healing Emotional Wounds: Apply NLP to resolve past traumas and emotional pain
Challenging Negative Thoughts: Master NLP techniques to reframe negative self-talk
Using Affirmations and Positive Self-Talk: Develop a positive mindset with NLP
NLP Models and Techniques: Explore key NLP models, visualizing guided techniques, and cognitive filters
Assignments and feedback sessions will be included to ensure participants are applying NLP techniques effectively
Participants will have access to additional resources, such as video lectures, articles, and exercises to practice outside of class
THIS COURSE IS OPEN TO ANYONE DEDICATED TO PERSONAL GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT, INCLUDING, PSYCHOLOGIST, THERAPISTS & STUDENTS.

programs.title: Mental Disorders Internship
programs.description: Learn about Mental disorders (depression, anxiety, schizophrenia), Psychological assessment, CBT, diagnosis, Report writing, Crisis intervention.

programs.title: Counselling Internship
programs.description: Learn how to Counsel as a Psychologist, Emotional and social issues  (grief, relationships, stress), Active listening, empathy, client-centered therapy and communication skills.

programs.title: Child Psychology
programs.description: Learn about Developmental issues and behavioral problems in children. Play therapy, developmental assessment, parent counseling and patience.

programs.title: School Psychology
programs.description: Learn about Academic, behavioral, and emotional issues in school-aged children	Educational testing, collaboration with teachers/parents, IEPs, behavioral intervention.

programs.title: Industrial/ Organisational Psychology
programs.description: Learn about Workplace behavior and performance. Employee assessment, organisational development and leadership training.

programs.title: Addiction Counselling
programs.description: Learn about Substance use, disorders and recovery. Motivational interviewing, relapse prevention, group therapy.

programs.title: Marriage and Family Therapist (MFT)
programs.description: Learn about Relationship and family dynamics. Systems theory, conflict resolution, family therapy techniques.

programs.title: Trauma Therapy
programs.description: Learn about PTSD, Abuse recovery, Complex trauma, EMDR, trauma-focused CBT, grounding techniques and crisis management.

includes: Read individual options for topics covered.
